emails.subject: RE: Remove Verus Users
emails.body_text:
Hello Steve,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

The users Mark Shin and Marco Sampaio access have been removed from the platform.

 

Please let us know if you need anything else.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Steve Limburg <steve@veruscommodities.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, December 16, 2025 18:22
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: Remove Verus Users

 

We see listed in our dashboard the users Mark Shin and Marco Sampaio. Neither of them are still employees with Verus and should be removed from our user list. I could not figure out how to do that from the User menu on the dashboard myself.

 

Please let me know if you need any additional information,

Steve

 

-- 

  

VERUS Commodities Management, LLC

steve@veruscommodities.com <mailto:marco@veruscommodities.com> 

Direct: + 1 303 376 2657  Cell: + 1 719 494 4519
